message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have available is not just any item; it holds immense value and significance, tailored specifically to meet your needs and desires. Given its unique attributes and the fact that it's worth $12000 to you, I propose a fair transaction at a price of $11000. This offer allows us both to benefit - you receive a valuable asset at a reasonable cost, while I secure a profitable sale. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.
